sentences.en: David said nothing, but simply nodded, as if understanding perfectly.
sentences.cn: 戴维什么都没说,只是点点头,好像完全理解了.

sentences.en: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question.
sentences.cn: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

sentences.en: He dressed simply and led a quiet family life.
sentences.cn: 他穿着简朴，过着平静的家庭生活。

sentences.en: He has simply been exposed as an adulterer and a fool.
sentences.cn: 有人揭发他就是个奸夫和白痴。

sentences.en: He simply won’t accept the committee’s decision.
sentences.cn: 他根本不接受委员会的决定。

sentences.en: I was afraid you'd simply feel we were imposing on you.
sentences.cn: 我担心你会觉得我们是在勉强你。

sentences.en: I was simply staggered by the heat of the Argentinian high-summer.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷盛夏的酷热真让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: It is quite simply the most ridiculous idea I’ve ever heard.
sentences.cn: 这简直是我听到过的最荒唐的想法。

sentences.en: It’s not simply a question of money.
sentences.cn: 这不仅仅是钱的问题。

sentences.en: Receding gums can be the result of disease or simply incorrect brushing.
sentences.cn: 牙龈萎缩可能是疾病导致的，也可能仅仅是错误的刷牙方式引起的。

sentences.en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentences.en: Simply dial the number and tell us your area.
sentences.cn: 只需拨这个号码告诉我们你在什么地方。

sentences.en: Some people simply can't take it and they just go insane.
sentences.cn: 一些人完全承受不了，结果就精神失常了。

sentences.en: Some students lose marks simply because they don’t read the question properly.
sentences.cn: 有些学生丢分只是因为没有好好读题目。

sentences.en: That would be simply wonderful!
sentences.cn: 那简直太棒了！

sentences.en: The rebel forces simply bypassed Zwedru on their way further south.
sentences.cn: 叛军在向南部挺进时直接绕过了绥德鲁。

sentences.en: Their luck had simply run out. Still, never fear.
sentences.cn: 他们的好运已经到头了。不过，别担心。

sentences.en: This work is simply not good enough.
sentences.cn: 这工作做得实在不够好。

sentences.en: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.cn: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.en: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.cn: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.en: Use a template or stencil or simply do it freehand.
sentences.cn: 使用样板或模版，或者干脆徒手画。

sentences.en: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.cn: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

sentences.en: What we need is not simply a smaller organization, but a more efficient one.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的不仅仅是一个精简的机构，而是一个更有效率的机构。

sentences.en: You can't simply wander around squatting on other people's property.
sentences.cn: 你不能这样到处乱窜，擅自占用别人的地产。

sentences.en: You simply can't get a ticket through official channels.
sentences.cn: 通过官方渠道是压根儿搞不到票的.
